meanings.sent1: Her valours shone brightly during the rescue mission.
meanings.sent2: The knight's valours inspired the villagers to stand up against the dragon.
meanings.sent3: Despite being scared, she mustered her valours and faced the challenge head-on.
meanings.sent4: In the face of danger, his valours were a beacon of hope for his comrades.
meanings.sent5: The valours of the firefighters saved many lives during the raging inferno.

meanings.definition: Qualities or actions that show courage or bravery
meanings.sent1: The valours of the soldiers were evident in their unwavering determination.
meanings.sent2: She admired the valours displayed by the young girl in standing up to the bully.
meanings.sent3: His valours in the face of adversity earned him the respect of his peers.
meanings.sent4: The valours of the team were tested in the final moments of the game.
meanings.sent5: The valours of the explorers led them to conquer the treacherous mountain.
